page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: The majority of the population who live within the area live a{Middle {class}life style.Nearly all families have access to one car and a large proportion are two car families. All families have a television and over half have video recorders.Many children have television sets in their own bedrooms. Well over half the families possess a computer.At least two thirds of the families have taken a holiday abroad in the last two years.All households own a washing machine and a refrigerator. The children although not having the restrictions of a school uniform do on the whole dress sensibly.They do however show an acute awareness of current fashion trends.They also follow closely the latest pop records and watch cult T.V.programmes.Average number of children per family is{2.64
